text.headline: Welcome to The Complete History of Gamecredits
text.text: Gamecredits The world's first decentralized gaming currency ...

media.caption: Release of Gamerscoin also known as Gamecredits

text.headline: Let the Games Begin
text.text: Gamecredits is born! GameCredits is the #1 Free Open Source Digital Gaming Currency sent through the internet.A new currency made by gamers for Gamers and GameDevs are you prepared...

text.headline: Dr.Bob the legend ...
text.text: According to legend, Dr.Bob began working on the Gamecredits concept in 2014,while he is on record as living in Germany.

text.headline: Dr.Bob announce GameCredits on Bitcointalk ...
text.text: A new and exciting gaming currency that will revolutionize in-game purchases and bring developers a monetization based on fair-play rules

text.headline: Version 0.1 is released ...
text.text: Version 0.1 of GameCredits is released. Compiled with Microsoft Visual Studio for Windows, it lacks a command line interface and is so complete that it furthers speculation that it was developed by more than one person (or by an academic with little programming experience and a great deal of theoretical know-how). It includes a Gamecredits generation system that would create a total of 84 million Gamecredits.

text.headline: The first Gamecredits transaction
text.text: The first transaction of Gamecredits currency, in block 162, takes place between Dr.Bob and Kammi, a developer and Gamer.

text.headline: The Genesis Block is mined
text.text: Gamecredits Block 0, the genesis block, is established at 21:59:00 GMT

text.headline: Gamecredits added to Poloniex
text.text: Poloniex is a US-based cryptocurrency exchange offering maximum security and advanced trading features.

text.headline: Gamerscoin rebranded to Gamecredits
text.text: The new Team behind GameCredits consists of a number of crypto currency and game developepment veterans. Such a coherent team ensures the stability and continued focus on the currencies future.

media.caption: Biomech, General Manager joined the Gamecredits Team

text.headline: Biomech, General Manager joined the Gamecredits Team
text.text: Anarchy is not chaos.

media.caption: Ring 13: Curse Of Nakamoto teaser introduced

text.headline: GameCredits Merges Gaming and Cryptocurrencies
text.text: The imminent launch of GameCredits’ multi-player game “Ring 13: The Curse of Nakamoto, aims to propel GameCredits to the forefront of mobile and online gaming industries. Injecting itself into this market delivers a vast network of opportunity for stakeholders, investors, customers, and users alike.

text.headline: GameCredits #gamecredits hits freenode IRC
text.text: The #gamecredits channel is registered on freenode IRC, a discussion network for free and open source gaming development communities.

text.headline: German version website is now available!
text.text: Gamecredits is an international open source project. Over the last year, users from over 120 countries have visited gamecredits.net

text.headline: GameCredits WebWallet made available
text.text: Be Your Own Bank.GameCredits WebWallet is a free online gamecredits wallet, which you can use to make worldwide payments for free. We make paying with gamecredits easy and secure available anywhere on your phone or desktop.We are not a bank, you retain complete ownership of your Money. We cannot view your balance, see your transactions or make payments on your behalf.

media.caption: GameCredits listed for trading on Cryptopia!

text.headline: GameCredits listed for trading on Cryptopia!
text.text: Cryptopia's focus is on a better user experience for crypto-currencies. In order to make cryptocurrencies more accessible to everyone we provide mining pools, marketplace, exchange services and a support framework for each coin listed.

media.caption: GameCredits – An Exciting Gaming Cryptocurrency That Will Revolutionize In-Game Purchases

text.headline: GameCredits – An Exciting Gaming Cryptocurrency That Will Revolutionize In-Game Purchases
text.text: I have no idea how I missed this amazing cryptocurrency! Yes GameCredits is one of the few cryptocurrencies that target to be a real business. They are ready to revolutionize Gaming for players & developers.

media.caption: TurboCharged – A new racer supporting GameCredits

text.headline: TurboCharged – A new racer supporting GameCredits
text.text: Once in a while a great idea is born. However, an idea is not worth much without the diligence and hard work in making it happen. Through late night coffee, blood, sweat and tears, it is brought to light.In the light, people see this new thing. Other men, like minded, join in the efforts. A newly formed game development studio flying a pale green flag might emerge…It says GameCredits, and waves proudly over its newest accomplishment.

text.headline: GameCredits Targets 65 Billion Gaming Industry
text.text: GameCredits’ primary initiative consists of developing a  digital currency-driven gaming platform, focused on providing an elegant, secure, and robust system aimed at replacing existing in-game purchasing options and mechanisms. BNC reached out to the team for an exclusive interview to find out more.

media.caption: GameCredits – Brave New Coin, Brand New Vision

text.headline: GameCredits – Brave New Coin, Brand New Vision
text.text: GameCredits’ primary initiative consists of developing a Currency-Driven Gaming Platform, focused on providing an elegant, and at the same time secure and robust system that can replace existing in-game purchasing options and mechanics.

media.caption: Gamecredits recently at Gamescom promoting their new games!

text.headline: Gamecredits recently at Gamescom promoting their new games!
text.text: Now on with the goods… Recently GameCredits was at GamersCom promoting their new game “Turbocharged” . Now I cant reveal too much except to say that their are many other games in the works that will use Gamecredits that will be “powered by gamecredits”.  This will revolutionize the way we play games as we know it. In case you havent heard of gamecredits, here is some great info

text.headline: TurboCharged game is launched!!!
text.text: TurboCharged is an action packed multiplayer competitive racing experience developed by Curious Cat Ltd in colaboration with the GameCredits Foundation. The game will be available most platforms existing today: Windows. MacOS, Linux, as well as mobile phones with iOS and Android! TurboCharged is game that uses GameCredits as in-game currency.

media.caption: Crypto Jeweler - Diamonds, Gold & Silver accepted GameCredits

text.headline: Crypto Jeweler - Diamonds, Gold & Silver accepted GameCredits
text.text: Crypto Jeweler is owned and operated by Ryan Scott and Bodi Klamph. We have both been involved in the crypto-currency space since 2012 and have been working on a number of related projects. Crypto Jeweler is the first true crypto-currency, jewelry store of its kind. At Crypto Jeweler, you can buy quality silver, gold and diamond jewelry using Crypto-Currencies. There is a vast number of jewelry to choose from, you can create your own personal account and place an order easily using Crypto-Currencies of your choice. Currently we are accepting Bitcoin, Litecoin, Peercoin, NXT and Dogecoin, though we are not limited to just these. Our goal is to use Crypto Currencies like Bitcoins for transactions and prefer them, offering 5% discounts on Bitcoin and GameCredits payments, but we still also accept standard US dollar.
